00017                 CString trimpath(fullpath);
00018                 int trimfpos = trimpath.ReverseFind('\\');
00019 
00020                 if (trimfpos != -1)
00021                         trimpath = trimpath.Left(trimfpos + 1); // keep the backslash ... 
00022                 return trimpath;
00023         }

00037         inline CGPSPortType getGPSPortTypeNum(void) {  
00038                 if (lastGPSPortType == "NMEA")
00039                         return CGPSPortTypesSerialNMEA; 
00040                 if (lastGPSPortType == "GarCOM")
00041                         return CGPSPortTypesSerialGarXface; 
00042                 if (lastGPSPortType == "GarUSB")
00043                         return CGPSPortTypesUSBGarXface; 
00044                 // Err on the safe side ... in search terms "all" will translate to "any"
00045                 return CGPSPortTypesAll;
00046         }
00047         inline void setGPSPortTypeNum(CGPSPortType GPS) { 
00048                 switch(GPS) {
00049                         case CGPSPortTypesSerialNMEA:
00050                                 lastGPSPortType="NMEA";
00051                                 break;
00052                         case CGPSPortTypesSerialGarXface:
00053                                 lastGPSPortType="GarCOM";
00054                                 break;
00055                         case CGPSPortTypesUSBGarXface:
00056                                 lastGPSPortType="GarUSB";
00057                                 break;
00058                         default:
00059                                 lastGPSPortType="";
00060                                 break;
00061                 }
00062         }
